column4: Aside from Firefox, what is likely the most fully functional/mature browser available?
Thank you yell0w. I'll try those out, FF doesn't wanna play nice with one of my websites i use for work.
I'd say Opera.  It's the only other one with market share, so to speak.  Epiphany is the gecko engine--not substantially different from Firefox for the problem you're having.
Konqueror has yet another rendering engine entirely, but is *really* far from mainstream.  Heh.
